title: The Self-cultivation After Becoming a Villain Girl - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Fantasy   Gender Bender   Harem   School Life   Yuri
tags: Complex Family Relationships   Cultivation   Demi-Humans   Demons   Dragons   Family Conflict   Fantasy World   Female Protagonist   Game Elements   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Male to Female   Modern Day   Pets   Reincarnated in a Game World   Sibling's Care   System Administrator   Transmigration
author: 南笙的鱼
description:
In this unpredictable world, you will never know what will happen in a moment, such as – becoming a passerby character in a game.

Nan Yin crossed over and became a passer-by girl in a game he had played. And he who just crossed over… ah no, it should be her, will usher in a bad ending.

Nan Yin: I don’t want a bad ending, I...>
